Mixed Ultimate team take first Friday points

The mixed Ultimate Frisbee team secured a dramatic Roses win on Friday afternoon

Rugby thirds thrash Lancaster

UYRUFC's 3rd XV put their opposition to the sword in the first of Saturday's two men's rugby fixtures

Late comeback in indoor women's hockey seconds

A superb comeback stunned Lancaster this afternoon as York Women's 2nds snatched a draw at the death in their Roses fixture

Bombers fight back to beat Centurions

Lancaster Bombers showed grit and determination to come back and beat York Centurions in the hotly anticipated Roses American Football match up

Second XV seal rugby whitewash

UYRUFC's second XV completed the men's rugby whitewash in a brutal contest on Saturday afternoon. York showed a great deal of composure and maturity to claim a 15-12 victory that was never assured until the final whistle

Men's Ultimate team fall to narrow indoor defeat

York's Mens Ultimate Frisbee players fell to a 6-5 defeat, after an energetic, closely fought match

Women's Ultimate win for Lancaster

York knew they were up against a strong team, having lost 9-4 in their match for Lancaster's Roses tournament last year

Relive the action from the first full day of Roses. Scores, commentary, match reports, and more

Roses 2013 Preview: Tennis

There are 14 points on offer for tennis at Roses this year, York's teams will be looking to secure all 14 points for the white rose

Roses 2013 Preview: Cycling

As they gear up for a tough summer ahead of them, York's road cycling team and mountain biking team will be looking for a win at Roses to set up their season

Roses 2013 Preview: Basketball

A mixed season for York's basketball squads will have left them more determined than ever before to taste Roses victory this weekend

Roses 2013 Preview: Pool and Snooker

Lancaster took the all the points in pool and snooker last year, and York will be desperate to turn that around in 2013

Roses 2013 Preview: Men's Cricket

After an agonising one wicket defeat at last year's Roses, York's men's cricketers will be hoping that their excellent season last year puts them in good stead to seal victory this weekend

Roses 2013 Preview: Trampolining

After an impressive victory on away soil last in last year's Roses, York's trampolining squad will be looking to emulate that success this weekend

Roses 2013 Preview: Ultimate Frisbee

By James Bithell

10 points are on offer in Ultimate Frisbee, with these fixtures set to be much tighter than in recent history

Roses 2013 Preview: Volleyball

Volleyball is set to serve up some of the most exciting action of the weekend, with 14 points on offer in the Sports Hall over Saturday and Sunday

Roses 2013 Preview: Darts

Our series of Roses previews continues with darts, with eight points on offer in Hendrix Hall on Saturday

Roses 2013 Preview: American Football

The Centurions got their first Roses win last year, and are now looking to repeat that scoreline on home soil

Roses 2013 Preview: Hockey

If Roses 2012 is anything to go by then the hockey fixtures are going to be very close indeed, and with 19 points up for grabs over Friday and Saturday it's vital that York are at their best

Roses 2013 Preview: Men's Football

After a season of strong performances in BUCS, Varsity, and local competition, UYAFC are looking to end their year on a high at Roses

Roses 2013 Preview: Women's Cricket

After a historic victory against Sheffield last week, the club's first ever, York will be looking to build on this season's early success with a comprehensive Roses victory

Roses 2013 Preview: Squash

There are five squash fixtures on Saturday afternoon, with the men's firsts clash in particular promising to be a high-quality encounter

Roses 2013 Preview: Fencing

Fencing has long been a strong suit for the White Rose, and York will be confident of picking up the points in these fixtures

Roses 2013 Preview: Lacrosse

The Lacrosse Club have enjoyed a fantastic season in the BUCS leagues, and will be expecting to carry that form into Roses

Roses 2013 Preview: Sailing

By James Bithell

After a hugely successful year that has seen the White Rose team reach the national championships, they will surely be confident of bringing the points home again

Roses 2013 Preview: Women's Rugby

Roses 2012 brought a string of heavy defeats for UYWRUFC, but can they turn things around this year on home soil?

Roses 2013 Preview: Equestrian

By James Bithell

After a brilliant victory in their final BUCS event of the season, York's equestrian team will be searching for further glory at Roses this year against a very impressive Lancaster team

Roses 2013 Preview: Swimming and Water Polo

York's swimming and water polo squads have excelled so far this year, and are well worth watching at Roses 2013
